activity_differential: pedestrians walking and interacting with street environment
camera tracking and focusing on people crossing and moving along the street
person skipping rope on the sidewalk
description: A street scene where a woman walks across the road toward the camera, then exits the frame as the camera pans and tracks her. Another woman later walks past a parked car, and the camera pans to follow the street activity. A tricycle enters the scene, and another woman is seen skipping rope on the sidewalk.

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: The person is likely to be to the left of the car, so flipping subject and object makes the spatial relation 'left of' plausible.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: flipped

relationship_filter_metadata.explanation: A person is unlikely to be to the right of a building as a spatial reference; more plausibly, the building is right of the person, so flipping subject and object makes sense.
relationship_filter_metadata.label: flipped
